00122 namespace hdstl{
00123 namespace concepts{
00124 
00125     template <class HDS> 
00126     struct BackwardHDSConcept {
00143         typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor halfedge_descriptor; 
00144         typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::traversal_category traversal_category;
00145         typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::backward_category backward_category;
00146 
00148 
00149 
00150         void constraints() {
00151             using namespace boost;
00152 
00153             function_requires<HDSConcept<HDS> >();
00154             function_requires<ConvertibleConcept<traversal_category,
00155             backward_traversal_tag> >();  
00156             const bool is_valid_storage_tag =
00157                     is_convertible<backward_category,prev_at_source_tag>::value ||
00158                     is_convertible<backward_category,prev_at_target_tag>::value ||
00159                     is_convertible<backward_category,prev_in_facet_tag>::value;
00160             BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( is_valid_storage_tag ); 
00161 
00162             const_constraints(hds);
00163         }
00164 
00166 
00167 
00168         void const_constraints(HDS const& hds){
00169             h = prev_in_facet(hds,h);
00170             h = prev_at_source(hds,h);
00171             h = prev_at_target(hds,h);
00172         }
00173 
00174       private:
00176 
00177 
00178         BackwardHDS hds;        // a halfedge data structure object
00179         halfedge_descriptor h;  // a halfedge descriptor
00180         halfedge_descriptor g;  // another halfedge descriptor
00181     };
00182 
00183 }  // close namespace concepts
00184 }  // close namespace hdstl
